meanings.sent1: The axiality of the wheel ensured a smooth ride.
meanings.sent2: The axiality of the Earth's rotation is crucial for our daily routines.
meanings.sent3: The axiality of the spinning top made it look like a tiny dancer.
meanings.sent4: The axiality of the compass needle always pointed north.
meanings.sent5: The axiality of the tree trunk made it stand tall and strong.

meanings.definition: The state of having an axis.
meanings.sent1: The toy car's axiality allowed it to move in a straight line.
meanings.sent2: The axiality of the globe made it easy to spin on its axis.
meanings.sent3: The axiality of the pencil on the desk made it look like a tiny tower.
meanings.sent4: The axiality of the seesaw determined which side would go up and down.
meanings.sent5: The axiality of the clock's hands showed the passing of time clearly.

meanings.definition: The property of being aligned with an axis.
meanings.sent1: The satellite's axiality ensured it stayed on course.
meanings.sent2: The axiality of the planets in our solar system is fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The axiality of the ruler on the desk made it look like a mini bridge.
meanings.sent4: The axiality of the dancer's movements captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The axiality of the building's design gave it a sense of balance and strength.
